productBaseInfoV1.title: Funk Qan Black with Grey Sneakers For Men(Black, Grey)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: This season is all about being colorful and funky, and what better than a pair of uber-cool espadrilles. Originally from pyrenees in spain, funk brings to you espadrilles that exemplify confidence, style, panache and comfort. Funk shoes have taken the goodness of traditional styled espadrille and transformed them into a modern day fashion accessory. These shoes are made in earthy materials such as canvas high quality fabrics, rubber and natural hemp to ensure utmost comfort at all times. These trendy designs are available in astounding colors ranging from ruby red, cool blue, ebony black to sandy brown making them extremely attractive and practical. These shoes are energetic, durable and its perfect snug-fit gives you the look that gets you hooked on to them. Funk shoes are ideal for a casual look and go really well with denims, shorts and chinos. So wear them to college everyday or to a beach when on a vacation. Wear them for an evening out with buddies or to that much awaited rock concert. Or simply wear them, as these will spell your flair, your flamboyance and your attitude. It?s time, to get your funk on.
